issue.message: Implicitly using the default locale is a common source of bugs: Use `String.format(Locale, ...)` instead
Implicitly using the default locale is a common source of bugs: Use `toUpperCase(Locale)` instead. For strings meant to be internal use `Locale.ROOT`, otherwise `Locale.getDefault()`.
Call to `CredentialManager.getCredential` without use of `NoCredentialException`
